column5: Good morning everyone, I seem to be having a problem accessing my gmail   Is anyone else have problems?  It won't accept my password for either of my accounts, and one time it did, it even downloaded my messages...but then when I clicked on a message, back to the sign in page I went  Thanks for your help, now I'm off to work.  Maureen
Hey Maureen  My gmail seems to be working. No problems with passwords or logging in.
....Not sure if it'll help Mo but I had to dump my cookies (not as bad as it sounds) before I could access the board this morning, you might try that.

Not sure if this helps, but mine was doing some weird things, like when I clicked a message another one would open...  I noticed there was a link at the top right called "Older Version" when I clicked it everything went back to the way I remember.  If you can get logged in I would suggest trying that!  Evan

Now that you mention it I've been having login probs for a couple of days. About every second time I tried to get in it would get hung up and give me an error on page message. I was using an old shortcut on my desktop. When I go to my Google start page to do it there are no problems. I can't try the old link now as I deleted it when it start getting even worse yesterday. Could be as someone says here there's a newer version or maybe just a change in the path at Google. If you're using an old shortcut or link you might try setting a new link from gmail.com or from google.ca  JF
